bibles.title: Eastern Min New Testament (Romanised)
bibles.title_vernacular: Mā-tái ... Mā-kō ... Lô-gă ... Iók-hâng dióng hók-ĭng cŭ

language.name: Min Dong Chinese
language.area: Fujian, Fu’an in northeast to Fuzhou in east central. Also in Brunei, Indonesia (Java and Bali), Malaysia (Peninsular), Singapore, Thailand, United States.

bibles.title: The Revised New Testament
bibles.title_vernacular: Ṭhāvara ʼa rhaṅʻ bhu rāʺ sa khaṅʻ

language.name: Burmese
language.area: South, central, and adjacent areas. Also in Bangladesh, Malaysia (Peninsular), Thailand, United States.

language.name: Min Nan Chinese
language.area: South Fujian, Guangdong, south Hainan Island, south Zhejiang, south Jiangxi provinces. Xiamen in south Fujian, Jiangxi, and Taiwan; Hainan in Hainan; Leizhou on Leizhou peninsula of southwest Guangdong; Chao-Shan in far east corner of Guangdong in Chaozhou-Shantou area; Longdu is a dialect island around Zhongshan City and Shaxi in Guangdong south of Guangzhou; Zhenan Min in southeast Zhejiang Province around Pingyang and Cangnan and on Zhoushan archipelago of northeast Zhejiang. Also in Brunei, Cambodia, Indonesia (Java and Bali), Malaysia (Peninsular), Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, United States.
